title.en: It All Starts with Playing Game Seriously

altTitles.en: 从认真玩游戏开始崛起

description.en:
even an ant can make a comeback in life, if he worked hard.Nothing is fated, you and i can both be a black horse. Game ( yuan world) descended in reality, player obtains character’s ability, the world hence gone into chaos. Hiding his intention to win but scared of dying Liu Yi reincarnated , first of all, he needs to start to take games seriously and overcome his fear and not be scared, so he can become a hero, and save the world. but will he be able to do that? find out more by reading it  
  
  
||  
One born as an ant out to have will and ambition. Fate has not yet been determined; each of us are a black horse. When the game [Yuan World] descended into reality, players gained the ability of their in-game characters. As such, the world became chaos. Liu Yi — forbearing, ambitious, yet afraid of fighting— time travels to an era before the game had become reality. Armed with the knowledge of the future, starting from the bottom to overcome his fear of fighting, Liu Yi rises up to the top, ultimately becoming the Savior and resolving the crisis of the apocalypse.||
description.pt-br: Até uma formiga pode voltar na vida, se trabalhar muito. Nada está fadado, você e eu podemos ser um cavalo negro. O jogo (mundo yuan) se tornou realidade, o jogador obtém a habilidade do personagem e, portanto, o mundo se torna o caos. Escondendo sua intenção de vencer mas com medo de morrer liu yi reencarnado, antes de tudo, ele precisa começar a levar os jogos a sério e superar o medo, para que possa se tornar um herói, e salvar o mundo. mas ele será capaz de fazer isso?
